attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop any further immigration into the UK for a period of 10 years to allow the backlog of illegals & asylam seekers to be resolved.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to stop any further immigration.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=actanonverba


Her Majesty's Government
